definition: seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: Find out him by the machine that can pass cold villa in the house.
sentences.chinese: 以只能通过寒家别墅的座机找到他。

sentences.english: But if you have a separate fax line, you might consider discontinuing it.
sentences.chinese: 你有独立的传真电话的话，你可以考虑淘汰座机。

sentences.english: Oh, and I never, ever listen to landline answerphone messages.
sentences.chinese: 对了，我从来不听座机留言。

sentences.english: Phone conferences and leisurely gabfests should be done on a landline.
sentences.chinese: 电话会议和长时间的闲聊应该用座机。

sentences.english: Many people are getting rid of their landlines entirely.
sentences.chinese: 很多人已经完全淘汰了座机电话。

sentences.english: Companies can even record conversations that traders have from their desk phones.
sentences.chinese: 公司甚至可以记录交易员通过办公室座机进行的通话。

sentences.english: Many people are getting rid of their  landlines entirely.
sentences.chinese: 很多人已经完全淘汰了座机电话。

sentences.english: Jamey agrees to call Gaines on a land phone line.
sentences.chinese: 杰米同意了用座机打电话给盖恩斯。

sentences.english: Call the number in mobile phone contacts with digital cordless telephone through one touch.
sentences.chinese: 手机电话薄通过数字无绳使用座机一键快捷呼出。

sentences.english: The president's plane was convoyed by five jet fighters.
sentences.chinese: 总统座机由五架战斗机护航。

sentences.english: While criss-crossing the state to gather support, his private plane crashed.
sentences.chinese: 在州内巡回演讲寻求支持时，他的私人座机坠毁了。

sentences.english: School-year renters no longer bother with landline phone service; everyone has cell phones.
sentences.chinese: 学校校舍不再安装座机，么个人都有手机了。
